turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Technogel.
turn.2: Technogel combines the adaptability and 3D deformation of a fluid with the stability of a solid to offer comfortable, supportive cushioning.
turn.3: Is there anything else unique about it?
turn.4: It's also known for its cooling effect: the material's high conductivity provides thermal regulation that can create a fresh, cool feeling and help avoid overheating.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: After years of research and design refinements, Technogel also launched its first line of consumer products in 2008 as the Technogel Sleeping brand of gel mattresses and pillows.
turn.8: The Technogel Sleeping collection is sold through various licensees and retailers in more than 50 countries.
turn.9: What other products did they make?
turn.10: A number of athletes use Technogel products for rejuvenating and restorative support required for peak performance.
turn.11: Did they have any other products?
turn.12: In 2013, the Technogel Sleeping VIVE line of luxury gel mattresses and pillows and the Technogel Living seating supports collection were both launched.
